Articles.Content:
Happy day today.

First Satellite into orbit. 

Minor mistake at separation added 5K to the Apo. But a stable orbit, hoorah!

![ksp_2_zpsjwfwwdp7.jpg](http://i1292.photobucket.com/albums/b580/fragglea/ksp_2_zpsjwfwwdp7.jpg)

(also in the news.....)

Bill tested the new Jet Glider.

![ksp_1_zpsfqjoqsmk.jpg](http://i1292.photobucket.com/albums/b580/fragglea/ksp_1_zpsfqjoqsmk.jpg)

Jeb carries out a test flight in the new Command Module.

![Clipboard04_zpsn5boumj7.jpg](http://i1292.photobucket.com/albums/b580/fragglea/Clipboard04_zpsn5boumj7.jpg)
well done! that's always a landmark for new players!

Dont worry about making an Orbit perfect, it really isnt worth it as long as it is stable ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

And of course, congrats ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hoorah! I just realized one very simple thing I can do to get more Tech unlocked...

(because of my recent science unlock).

Next mission is to catalog some more of the Kerbal surface. Unlock more goodies, and then figure out my next space mission.
